title: NEAT Input
description: National Energy Audit Tool audit data input

audit.title: Audit Information
audit.$comment: The additionalProperties setting should limit any personally identifying information (PII) from the API

audit_id.title: Audit ID
audit_id.description: Required integer numeric identifier for the audit, mirrored in output, but otherwise unused in analysis

audit_number.title: Audit Number
audit_number.description: An optional supplemental integer numeric identifier requried for the audit record, also mirrored in output but otherwise not used in analysis

audit_date.title: Audit Date
audit_date.description: The audit date in ISO 6801 javascript Date.toJSON output

do_billing_adjust.title: Billing Adjustment
do_billing_adjust.description: Should run include utility billing adjustment

screens_removed_for_winter.title: Window Sreens Removed for Winter
screens_removed_for_winter.description: Does the occupant normally remove screens and/or open louvers for winter (default = NO)

wsf.title: Wind Shielding Factor
wsf.description: The factor (weather/wind) used for ASHRAE 62.2 calculations (1/hr)

avg_no_occupants.title: The average number of occupants
avg_no_occupants.description: The average number of occupants in the dwelling

num_bedrooms.title: Number of bedrooms
num_bedrooms.description: The  number of bedrooms in the dwelling

weather_station.title: Weather Station Selection
weather_station.description: Information on the weather station file to use.  This is the selection from the 1011 stations available for v10 weather

state.title: State Code
state.description: The two letter code for the state

file.title: File Name
file.description: Name of the weather file with .JSON extension.  MUST exist in the sys/weather/v10 folder (case sensitive)

wsf.title: Wind Shielding Factor
wsf.description: The factor (weather/wind) used for ASHRAE 62.2 calculations (1/hr)

walls.title: Walls
walls.description: The list of walls in the building shell

code.title: Wall Code
code.description: The short code for this Wall (must be unique for this job), no comma characters

stud_size.title: Stud Size
stud_size.description: The size of the studs used in the Wall construction

ext_type.title: Exterior Type
ext_type.description: The type of Wall exterior material

orient.title: Orientation
orient.description: The orientation of the line perpendicular to the wall

area.title: Gross Area (sq ft)
area.description: Gross area of the Wall including doors and windows (sq ft)

measure_number.title: Measure #
measure_number.description: Select the measure number to use

exist_insulation.title: Existing Insulation Type
exist_insulation.description: Type of existing Insulation in wall

exist_r.title: Existing Insulation R Value
exist_r.description: The R value of the existing Insulation

added_insulation.title: Added Insulation Type
added_insulation.description: Type of Insulation to be added to wall
added_insulation.$comment: Note that items 3 - 7 are for user defined insulation types

windows.title: Windows
windows.description: The list of windows in the building shell

code.title: Window Code
code.description: The short code for this window (must be unique for windows on each wall), no commas

frame_type.title: Frame Type
frame_type.$comment: Item 1 was (Wood, Vinyl, or Fiberglass) changed to just Wood at v10.04.001 for E+ disambiguation

glazing_type.title: Glazing Type
glazing_type.description: The window glazing type,  Storm window info now separate as of v10.04.01
glazing_type.$comment: Modified at v10.04.001 replacing the old glazing_type etable values. NOT a positive delta!

int_shading.title: Interior Shading
int_shading.description: The type of interior shading for the window

ext_shading.title: Exterior Shading
ext_shading.description: The type of exterior shading for the window. Added v10.04.001. The variable (shade) has been removed.

overhang_projection.title: Overhang projection (in)
overhang_projection.description: Existing overhang horizontal projection. Added v10.04.001. Only for ext_shading = Overhang or Awning

overhang_offset.title: Overhang offset (in)
overhang_offset.description: Vertical distance from window lintel (top) to bottom of overhang. Horizontal overhang assumed. Added v10.04.001. Only for ext_shading = Overhang or Awning

leak.title: Leakiness
leak.description: General window and frame leakiness estimate

number.title: Number
number.description: Number of identical windows on this wall or roof

wall_code.title: Wall Code
wall_code.description: Select the Wall where this window is located

roof_code.title: Roof Code
roof_code.description: Select the Roof where this skylight is located

roof_type.title: Roof Type for code
roof_type.description: The type of roof where skylight is located

weatherize_evaluate.title: Evaluate Weatherize Window
weatherize_evaluate.description: Consider window weatherizaton and sort in package by SIR

weatherize_required.title: Weatherize Window Required
weatherize_required.description: Require the window weatherization as H&S or Repair regardless of SIR

weatherize_inc_sir.title: Weatherize Window Required Include in SIR
weatherize_inc_sir.description: The required window weatherization SIR should be included in the package SIR

weatherize_additional_cost.title: Weatherization added cost ($/window)
weatherize_additional_cost.description: Additional per window cost to seal/weatherize

replace_evaluate.title: Evaluate Window Replacement
replace_evaluate.description: Consider window replacement and sort in package by SIR

replace_required.title: Window Replacement Required
replace_required.description: Require the window replacement as H&S or Repair regardless of SIR

replace_inc_sir.title: The Window Required Replacement Include in SIR
replace_inc_sir.description: The required window replacement SIR should be included in the package SIR

replace_additional_cost.title: Replacement added cost ($/window)
replace_additional_cost.description: Additional per window cost to replace

replace_u_value.title: Replacement window U-Value
replace_u_value.description: The nominal U-Value for the replacement window

replace_shgc.title: Replacement window Solar Heat Gain Coefficient (SHGC)
replace_shgc.description: The nominal SHGC for the replacement window

add_storm_evaluate.title: Evaluate Adding Storm Window
add_storm_evaluate.description: Consider adding storm and sort in package by SIR

add_storm_required.title: Adding Storm Required
add_storm_required.description: Require the addition of storm windows as H&S or Repair regardless of SIR

add_storm_inc_sir.title: The Window Required Replacement Include in SIR
add_storm_inc_sir.description: The required window replacement SIR should be included in the package SIR

add_storm_additional_cost.title: Replacement added cost ($/window)
add_storm_additional_cost.description: Additional per window cost to replace

add_awning_evaluate.title: Evaluate Adding Awning
add_awning_evaluate.description: Consider adding awning and sort in package by SIR

add_awning_additional_cost.title: Replacement added cost ($/window)
add_awning_additional_cost.description: Additional per window cost to replace

add_awning_overhang_projection.title: Horizontal Projection (inches)
add_awning_overhang_projection.description: Distance from wall to end of overhang (horizontal inches)

add_awning_overhang_offset.title: Distance from Lintel(inches)
add_awning_overhang_offset.description: Distance from lintel (top) to bottom of overhang (vertial inches)

add_ext_shading_evaluate.title: Evaluate Adding Exterior Shading
add_ext_shading_evaluate.description: Should addtion of external shading device be evaluated for inclusion by SIR

add_ext_shading_additional_cost.title: External Shading Added Cost ($/window)
add_ext_shading_additional_cost.description: Additional per window cost for external shading

add_ext_shading_type.title: Added Exterior Shading
add_ext_shading_type.description: The type of exterior shading to add to the window.

doors.title: Doors
doors.description: The list of doors in the building shell

code.title: Door Code
code.description: The short code for this door (must be unique for doors on each wall), no commas

wall.title: Wall Code
wall.description: Select the Wall where this door is located

number.title: Number
number.description: Number of identical doors on this wall

inc_sir.title: Include in SIR
inc_sir.description: Include this door replacement in overall SIR

unfinished_attics.title: Unfinished Attics
unfinished_attics.description: The list of unfinished attic spaces in the building shell

code.title: Attic Code
code.description: The short code for this unfinished attic space (must be unique for this audit), no commas

area.title: Area (sq feet)
area.description: Area of unfinished attic space in sq ft

exist_insulation.title: Existing Insulation Type
exist_insulation.description: Type of existing Insulation in attic

ins_depth.title: Existing Insulation Depth (in)
ins_depth.description: Depth of the existing Insulation in inches

added_insulation.title: Added Insulation Type
added_insulation.description: Type of Insulation to be added to attic
added_insulation.$comment: Note that items 4 - 7 are for user defined insulation types

measure_number.title: Measure #
measure_number.description: Select the measure number to use

max_depth.title: Max. Depth (in)
max_depth.description: Maximum possible Insulation depth in inches

added_R.title: Added R Value
added_R.description: A specific R value of Insulation to be added

finished_attics.title: Finished Attics
finished_attics.description: The list of finished attic spaces in the building shell

code.title: Attic Code
code.description: The short code for this finished attic space(must be unique for this audit), no commas

floor_type.title: Attic Floor Type
floor_type.description: Floor type of finished attic area

area.title: Area (sq feet)
area.description: Area of finished attic space in sq ft

exist_insulation.title: Existing Insulation Type
exist_insulation.description: Type of existing Insulation in finished attic

ins_depth.title: Existing Insulation Depth (in)
ins_depth.description: Depth of the existing Insulation in inches

measure_number.title: Measure #
measure_number.description: Select the measure number to use

added_insulation.title: Added Insulation Type
added_insulation.description: Type of Insulation to be added to attic spaces other than kneewall

added_kneewall.title: Added Kneewall Insulation Type
added_kneewall.description: Type of Insulation to be added to attic kneewall

max_depth.title: Max. Depth (in)
max_depth.description: Maximum possible Insulation depth in inches

added_R.title: Added R Value
added_R.description: A specific R value of Insulation to be added

foundations.title: Foundations
foundations.description: The list of foundations for the building shell

code.title: Foundation Code
code.description: The short code for this foundation (must be unique for this audit), no commas

area.title: Area (sq feet)
area.description: Area of attic space in sq ft

flr_ins_r.title: Floor Existing Insulation R Value
flr_ins_r.description: R value of existing foundation ceiling (floor) Insulation

added_sill.description: Type of sill Insulation to add

sill_r.description: R value of existing foundation sill insulation

wall_height.description: Foundation wall height to be insulated

perim_length.description: Length of foundation wall space perimeter (ft)

added_found.description: Type of foundation Wall Insulation to add

added_floor.description: Type of floor Insulation to add

hvac.title: HVAC Systems
hvac.description: The list of heating and cooling systems

code.title: HVAC System Code
code.description: The short code for this HVAC system (must be unique for this audit), no commas

id.title: Primary Key
id.description: Normalize incrementing primary key of HVAC system

system_type.title: Equipment Type
system_type.description: Type of heating or cooling system

fuel.title: Primary Fuel
fuel.description: Type of primary fuel for the HVAC system

heat_pump_backup_fuel.title: Backup Fuel
heat_pump_backup_fuel.description: Type of backup fuel if the system type is heat pump

efficiency_method.title: Efficiency Input Method
efficiency_method.description: How is the efficiency of the equipment enterted.  Available choiced based on system type and fuel

year_manufactured.title: Year Manufactured
year_manufactured.description: If efficiency_method = Year Manufactured. < today and <= year_installed

heat_efficiency.title: Heating Efficiency
heat_efficiency.description: The heating efficiecny expressed in heat_efficiency_units

heat_efficiency_units.title: Heating Efficiency Units
heat_efficiency_units.description: The units for the heat_efficiency numeric input

heat_output_capacity.title: Output Capacity
heat_output_capacity.description: Output capacity in the units specified for heat_output_capacity_units
heat_output_capacity.$comment: The min/max range is expanded for all the different heat_output_capacity_units

heat_output_capacity_units.title: Output Capacity Units
heat_output_capacity_units.description: The units for the heat_output_capacity value. Note expanded range to handle Btu/hr

heat_fraction.title: Fraction of Load Served
heat_fraction.description: What fraction of the heating load is served. Sum of all HVAC records < 1.0

cool_efficiency.title: Cooling Efficiency
cool_efficiency.description: The cooling efficiecny expressed in cool_efficiency_units

cool_efficiency_units.title: Cooling Efficiency Units
cool_efficiency_units.description: The units for the cool_efficiency numeric input

cool_output_capacity.title: Output Capacity
cool_output_capacity.description: Output capacity in the units specified for cool_output_capacity_units
cool_output_capacity.$comment: The min/max range is expanded for all the different cool_output_capacity_units

cool_output_capacity_units.title: Output Capacity Units
cool_output_capacity_units.description: The units for the cool_output_capacity value. Note expanded range to handle Btu/hr

cool_fraction.title: Fraction of Load Served
cool_fraction.description: What fraction of the cooling load is served. Sum of all HVAC records < 1.0

atmospheric_combustion.title: Atmoshperic Burner
atmospheric_combustion.description: Is there a burner running at atmospheric pressure

vent_damper.title: Automatic Vent Damper
vent_damper.description: Is a vent damper present (if combustion fuel and not sealed/condensing)

iid.title: IID
iid.description: Is there an intermittent ignition device rather than pilot light

pilot_light.title: Pilot Light
pilot_light.description: Is there a pilot light rather than intermittent ignition device

pilot_light_summer.title: Pilot Light On in Summer
pilot_light_summer.description: if pilot_light is true, is the pilot light on during the summer months

year_installed.title: Year Installed
year_installed.description: The year the equipment was installed. Should be >= year_manufactured

heat_setback_used.title: Heating Setback Used
heat_setback_used.description: The existing system uses a night setback strategy

smart_thermostat_evaluate.title: Install Smart Thermostat
smart_thermostat_evaluate.description: Add a smart thermostat. Applies to only one/primary heating system

smart_thermostat_required.title: Install Smart Thermostat Required
smart_thermostat_required.description: Adding a smart thermostat is required

smart_thermostat_inc_sir.title: Install Smart Thermostat Include in SIR
smart_thermostat_inc_sir.description: Adding a smart thermostat is required AND should be included in the package SIR

smart_thermostat_setback.title: Heating Nighttime Setback (F)
smart_thermostat_setback.description: The setback amount in (F) to subtract from the heating setpoint (in key parameters)

smart_thermostat_setback_hours_per_day.title: Daily Setbak Hours
smart_thermostat_setback_hours_per_day.description: How many hours per night to apply the set back (hr)

smart_thermostat_additional_cost.title: Additional Cost ($)
smart_thermostat_additional_cost.description: How much cost to add/discount for the smart thermostat in addition to the material and labor cost from the library

tuneup_evaluate.title: Tune Up
tuneup_evaluate.description: Evaluate a system tune-up to improve efficiecny of existing system

tuneup_inc_sir.description: Tun Up is required AND should be included in the package SIR

tuneup_heating_percent_improvement.title: Efficiency Improvements (%) heating
tuneup_heating_percent_improvement.description: The improvement in heating thermal efficiency in delta percent of afue from tune up

tuneup_cooling_percent_improvement.title: Efficiency Improvements (%) cooling
tuneup_cooling_percent_improvement.description: The improvement in cooling thermal efficiency in delta percent of seer from tune up

tuneup_additional_cost.title: Additional Cost ($)
tuneup_additional_cost.description: How much cost to add/discount for the tune-up in addition to the material and labor cost from the library

replace_evaluate.title: Replace the Equipment
replace_evaluate.description: Replace the HVAC system with a new system

replace_inc_sir.title: Replace the Equipment Include in SIR
replace_inc_sir.description: Replacing equipment is required AND should be included in the package SIR

replace_system_type.description: Type of heating or cooling system for replacment

replace_fuel.description: Type of primary fuel for the HVAC replacement system

replace_heat_pump_backup_fuel.title: Replacement Backup Fuel
replace_heat_pump_backup_fuel.description: Type of backup fuel if the replacement system type is heat pump

replace_heat_efficiency.description: The heating efficiency expressed in heat_efficiency_units for replacement

replace_heat_efficiency_units.description: The units for the heat_efficiency numeric input for replacement

replace_heat_output_capacity.title: Output Capacity
replace_heat_output_capacity.description: Output capacity in the units specified for heat_output_capacity_units

replace_heat_output_capacity_units.title: Output Capacity Units
replace_heat_output_capacity_units.description: The units for the heat_output_capacity value. Note expanded range to handle Btu/hr for replacement

replace_heat_fraction.title: Fraction of Load Served
replace_heat_fraction.description: What fraction of the heating load is served. Sum of all HVAC records < 1.0 for replacement

replace_cool_efficiency.description: The cooling efficiecny expressed in cool_efficiency_units for replacement

replace_cool_efficiency_units.description: The units for the cool_efficiency numeric input for replacement

replace_cool_output_capacity_units.description: The units for the cool_output_capacity value. Note expanded range to handle Btu/hr for replacement

replace_cool_fraction.title: Fraction of Load Served
replace_cool_fraction.description: What fraction of the cooling load is served. Sum of all HVAC records < 1.0 for replacement

replace_life.title: Replacement Lifetime (yr)
replace_life.description: Lifetime of the replacement hvac system (yr)

also_replaces_hvac_ids.title: Also Replaces
also_replaces_hvac_ids.description: A comma separated list of HVAC.id values as strings for systems this replacement also replaces

duct.title: Duct details associated with HVAC systems

code.description: The short code for this Duct (must be unique for this audit), no commas

duct_type.title: Duct Type
duct_type.description: Which type of duct, supply or return air

hvac_heating_id_served.description: Reference to the PK of the HVAC heating system served by this duct. Zero means none served
